page.title: 04Fashion in Dumfries
page.content: People in Dumfries all have different opinions about fashion in the town. Some teenagers, girls and boys, don't think there is any fashion in Dumfries. Teenage girls like shops such as{Chelsea Girl}and{Wrygges.}They like bright colours.Teenage boys shop elsewhere. Although some like to shop in{Burtons,}some boys like to get their clothes from{Charity shops}and {Oxfam. Older women think that clothes are badly made. They like{Marks and {Spencers, Binns, Barbours}and {Mothercare}for their children. They think teenage girls and boys are brightly dressed. Visitors in Dumfries think that everyone is smartly dressed. Young men think clothes are to expensive. Overall everyone thinks that clothes are too expensive but the people dress well.
